name: ImageMenuItem

returns.description: %TRUE if the menu item will always show the image

methods.name: get_always_show_image
methods.description:
Returns whether the menu item will ignore the #GtkSettings:gtk-menu-images
setting and always show the image, if available.

returns.description: the widget set as image of @image_menu_item

methods.name: get_image
methods.description:
Gets the widget that is currently set as the image of @image_menu_item.
See gtk_image_menu_item_set_image().

returns.description: %TRUE if the label set in the menuitem is used as a

methods.name: get_use_stock
methods.description:
Checks whether the label set in the menuitem is used as a
stock id to select the stock item for the item.

stock id to select the stock item for the item

methods.name: set_accel_group
methods.description:
Specifies an @accel_group to add the menu items accelerator to
(this only applies to stock items so a stock item must already
be set, make sure to call gtk_image_menu_item_set_use_stock()
and gtk_menu_item_set_label() with a valid stock item first).

If you want this menu item to have changeable accelerators then
you shouldnt need this (see gtk_image_menu_item_new_from_stock()).

methods.name: set_always_show_image

parameters.name: always_show
parameters.description: %TRUE if the menuitem should always show the image

methods.description:
If %TRUE, the menu item will ignore the #GtkSettings:gtk-menu-images
setting and always show the image, if available.

Use this property if the menuitem would be useless or hard to use
without the image.

methods.name: set_image

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: a widget to set as the image for the menu item.

methods.description:
Sets the image of @image_menu_item to the given widget.
Note that it depends on the show-menu-images setting whether
the image will be displayed or not.

methods.name: set_use_stock

parameters.name: use_stock
parameters.description: %TRUE if the menuitem should use a stock item

methods.description:
If %TRUE, the label set in the menuitem is used as a
stock id to select the stock item for the item.

properties.name: accel-group
properties.description: The Accel Group to use for stock accelerator keys

properties.name: always-show-image
properties.description:
If %TRUE, the menu item will ignore the #GtkSettings:gtk-menu-images
setting and always show the image, if available.

Use this property if the menuitem would be useless or hard to use
without the image.

properties.name: use-stock
properties.description:
If %TRUE, the label set in the menuitem is used as a
stock id to select the stock item for the item.

description:
A GtkImageMenuItem is a menu item which has an icon next to the text label.

Note that the user can disable display of menu icons, so make sure to still
fill in the text label.
